PossibleValue.Comment: SDMMC1 Internal DMA buffer End Flag

Circular list looping on second transfer

Byte endianness exchanged when destination data size is > BYTE
Half word endianness exchanged when destination data size is > HALF WORD
Byte endianness exchanged when destination data size is > BYTE
Half word endianness exchanged when destination data size is > HALF WORD
Word endianness exchanged when destination data size is > WORD

RefParameter.Comment: Src Memory Address for the Node, example:'(uint32_t)&my_address[0]'or '0x12345678')
RefParameter.Name: SrcAddress

RefParameter.Comment: Dest Memory Address for the Node , example:'(uint32_t)&my_address[0]'or '0x12345678')
RefParameter.Name: DstAddress

RefParameter.Comment: Data length of a block in byte
RefParameter.Name: BlockDataLength

RefParameter.Comment: Block Counter (number of blocks to be transfered)
RefParameter.Name: BlockCount
